Class CompanyBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.info.managedbean.CompanyBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CompanyBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Managed bean for handling company information.

      • getCompanies

        public java.util.List<Company> getCompanies()
        Getter method for companies.

        List of all companies stored in database.

        id of company.

        public void setId(java.lang.Integer id)
        Setter method for id.
        Parameters:
        id - id of company to set.

      • getCompany

        public Company getCompany()
        Getter method for company. If id is set to value other than null company with that id is retrieved from database. Otherwise, new company is initialized.
        Returns:
        company with id if that id is not null, or newly initialized company, otherwise.

      • setCompany

        public void setCompany(Company company)
        Setter method for company.
        Parameters:
        company - company to set.

      • addNewCompany

        public java.lang.String addNewCompany()
        Method for adding new company. Probably, for this purpose it is better to use void addNewCompany(ActionEvent ae).
        Returns:
        company details view in case of successful company addition, or add company view if new company has non-unique license field.

      • updateCompany

        public java.lang.String updateCompany()
        Method for updating a company. Probably, for this purpose it is better to use void updateCompany(ActionEvent ae).
        Returns:
        company details view in case of successful company update, or edit company view if company being edited has non-unique license field.

      • deleteCompany

        public java.lang.String deleteCompany()
        Method for deleting a company. Probably, for this purpose it is better to use void deleteCompany(ActionEvent ae). Also, need to think about a way to handle situation in which company to be deleted has one or more employees.
        Returns:
        list of all companies view in case of successful company deletion.
